channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Bitwarden supercharges credential protection for Premium and Family plans – new update adds vault health alerts, password strength coaching, 5GB secure storage, and phishing protections
item.description: Bitwarden is upgrading protection across Individual and Family plans, but the price is going up too.

item.title: À seulement 162 €, le Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 5G (256 Go) est la solution pas chère pour changer de smartphone durant les soldes
item.description: Même si le Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 5G vient d'être remplacé, il reste un bon smartphone milieu de gamme à conseiller. C’est d’autant plus vrai, maintenant qu’il passe de 303 euros à seulement 162 euros à l’occasion des soldes.

item.title: Netflix scores Oscar nominations for Frankenstein and KPop Demon Hunters
item.description: The nominees for the 2026 Academy Awards were just announced and Ryan Coogler's vampire-adjacent period drama Sinners received a record-breaking 16 nominations. That's the highest number of Oscar nominations for a single film in the history of the awards, followed by Titanic, La La Land and All About Eve with 14 noms each. Sinners grabbed a nomination in nearly every major category, including Best Picture, Best Director and Best Original Screenplay. The same goes for the performances, as Michael B. Jordan captured the nomination for Best Actor. Even Delroy Lindo got nominated for Best Supporti...

item.title: The FBI Has Gained Access to the Washington Post Newsroom
item.description: New court documents claim the feds could access Slack channels, Signal chats, email, and more.

item.title: Waymo is now available in Miami
item.description: Waymo’s fully autonomous robotaxis are now accepting passengers in Miami. The city was one of five named in expansion plans last year, and joins the likes of Phoenix, Los Angeles and the San Francisco Bay Area on Waymo’s existing network. Waymo says that nearly 10,000 Miami residents have signed up so far, and that it will send out invites to new riders on a rolling basis" in the weeks and months to come. The autonomous ride-hailing service will initially cover a 60-square-mile area that includes neighborhoods like the Design District and Wynwood, with Waymo planning to expand to Miami Interna...

item.title: Clubic, Frandroid et Numerama réunis au sein du même groupe
item.description: Il y a des nouvelles qu'on écrit avec un plaisir particulier. Je lis Clubic depuis le collège. C'est là que j'ai, comme beaucoup d'entre vous, appris à aimer la tech. Aujourd'hui, la boucle est bouclée : Clubic rejoint Frandroid et Numerama chez Humanoid. C'est une fierté immense, et je vous explique pourquoi.

item.title: 5 innovations I want from iOS... that'll keep me away from Android
item.description: iOS is a great operating system, but it has the potential to be so much more with the addition of these innovative features.

item.title: Apple gagne une bataille cruciale en France concernant la pub sur iPhone
item.description: Le tribunal judiciaire de Paris a décidé qu'Apple n'avait pas à suspendre son système d'App Tracking Transparency en France. Un dispositif qui lui vaut bien des problèmes en Europe.

item.title: 15 000 € pour remplacer la batterie d’une voiture électrique ? Pourquoi ce scénario catastrophe n’arrive (presque) jamais
item.description: Vous craignez de devoir débourser 15 000 € pour changer la batterie de votre voiture électrique ? Respirez : grâce aux progrès technologiques, les garanties constructeurs et l’émergence d'alternatives économiques, moins de 4 % des propriétaires sont confrontés à ce scénario avant 10 ans d'utilisation.

item.title: Xbox Developer Direct 2026: How to watch and what we expect to see from Fable, Forza Horizon 6 and Beast of Reincarnation
item.description: Xbox is set to hold the fourth installment of its now-annual Developer Direct showcase on January 22. You’ll be able to watch the 2026 edition at 1PM ET on YouTube (including versions with audio descriptions and ASL), Twitch, Facebook and Steam. Xbox will stream the Developer Direct on its regional channels simultaneously, and it’ll be available on Bilibili on Friday. The YouTube stream might be the way to go, since that one will be available in 4K and 60 fps. Because we’re so nice, we’ve embedded that stream above, so all you have to do is click the play button when the time is right.Microsof...

item.title: How to watch 2026 Best Picture Oscar nominees online from anywhere – from One Battle After Another to Sinners
item.description: As the annual streamathon arrives ahead of the big night on March 15, here's a full guide to stream all 10 Best Picture Oscar nominees 2026 wherever you are.

item.title: Samsung : voici les 17 bonnes affaires à dénicher à la 3e démarque de soldes
item.description: La 3e démarque des soldes est désormais lancée, avec des offres encore plus alléchantes du côté de Samsung. Smartphones pliables comme le Galaxy Z Flip 7, TV OLED en forte réduction ou encore écrans Ultra Wide OLED : les bonnes affaires se multiplient pour tous les goûts.

item.title: The Cast of ‘A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms’ Digs Into Character Relationships
item.description: Peter Claffey, Shaun Thomas, and Tanzyn Crawford talk about Dunk, Raymun, and Tanselle’s connections on the new HBO ‘Game of Thrones’ spin-off.

item.title: Les étranges contradictions de YouTube sur les vidéos « slop IA »
item.description: Le patron de YouTube dit avoir compris que le « slop IA » agace les utilisateurs de la plateforme, mais son annonce sème le doute.

item.title: Google is bringing Personal Intelligence to AI Mode in Google Search
item.description: Google's Personal Intelligence feature can check your Gmail and Google Photos to help provide personalized recommendations in AI Mode.

item.title: Google Search AI Mode can use Gmail and Photos to get to know you
item.description: Google is helping AI Mode to provide more personalized responses in Search by allowing the chatbot to analyze your Gmail and Google Photos accounts. After launching for Gemini AI last week, "Personal Intelligence" is now coming to tailor AI Mode search results to your interests and daily life by gathering information from your emails and […]

item.title: Google’s AI Mode can now tap into your Gmail and Photos to provide tailored responses
item.description: The company notes that AI Mode doesn’t train directly on your Gmail inbox or Google Photos library. Instead, it trains on specific prompts and the model’s responses.

item.title: I've just seen my dream gaming machine: a modder has combined an Xbox Series X, PS5, and Switch 2 into one mega-console, and I only wish I could buy it
item.description: Gamers, here's your dream console, which you could have if Sony, Microsoft, and Nintendo joined hands, but we all know that's never happening.

item.title: AI Mode in Google search can now pull context from your other apps
item.description: After adding Personal Intelligence to Gemini as an opt-in experience, Google has announced that it’s also integrating the feature into AI Mode in Search. What Personal Intelligence does is pull information from your Google apps to tailor its responses based on your history and interests. For Search, in particular, you can allow Personal Intelligence to look for information in your Gmail accounts and Google Photos libraries.If you use AI Mode to shop for clothes with the new feature enabled, for instance, Google could recommend items or models from a brand you previously purchased from. If it s...

item.title: Claude is down for many – here's everything we know so far
item.description: If you can't get a conversation going with the popular AI tool, you're not alone.

item.title: This Dreame vacuum is nearly 50% off — shop at Amazon and save $450
item.description: As of Jan. 22, get the Dreame L40s Ultra robot vacuum for 45% off at Amazon, saving you over $450.

item.title: ExpressVPN two-year plans are up to 78 percent off right now
item.description:
ExpressVPN is back on sale again, and its two-year plans are up to 78 percent off right now. You can get the Advanced tier for $101 for 28 months. This is marked down from the $392 that this time frame normally costs. On a per-month basis, it works out to roughly $3.59 for the promo period. We’ve consistently liked ExpressVPN because it’s fast, easy to use and widely available across a large global server network. In fact, it's our current pick for best premium VPN. One of the biggest drawbacks has always been its high cost, and this deal temporarily solves that issue.
In our review we were...

item.title: I put this high-end OLED TV side-by-side with LG and Samsung's models, and it has two secret weapons that make it my top choice
item.description: While the LG G5 and Samsung S95F may be the more familiar OLED TVs, don't sleep on the Philips OLED910.

item.title: Wicked: For Good receives exactly zero Oscar noms
item.description: 'Wicked' sequel was completely snubbed from the 2026 Academy Awards.

item.title: The U.S. homicide rate is plunging in dozens of cities, including these, data shows
item.description: Little Rock is the only city showing a double-digit increase—by 16%—from 2024. Data collected from 35 American cities showed a 21% decrease in the homicide rate from 2024 to 2025, translating to about 922 fewer homicides last year, according to a new report from the independent Council on Criminal Justice.The report, released on Thursday, tracked 13 crimes and recorded drops last year in 11 of those categories including carjackings, shoplifting, aggravated assaults and others. Drug crimes saw a small increase over last year and sexual assaults stayed even between 2024 and 2025, the study found...

item.title: GitLab patches major security flaw - here's what we know
item.description: A new patch fixes six important flaws, including ones allowing for 2FA bypass.

item.title: Want cleaner floors? Grab the Ecovacs Deebot T50 Pro Omni for $300 off.
item.description: Amazon has the Ecovacs T50 Pro Omni robot vacuum and mop on sale for just $399. That's 43% off and its best price ever.

item.title: Lenovo wants other companies to make accessories for its modular laptops.
item.description: Two years ago, Lenovo introduced a collection of modular Magic Bay accessories for its ThinkBook 16p. They attached to a magnetic pin connector at the top of the laptop's display and added functionality like an improved 4K webcam, or LTE connectivity. The company has since expanded Magic Bay compatibility to more of its laptops and […]

item.title: Here’s what you should know about the US TikTok deal
item.description: A number of investors are competing for the opportunity to purchase the app, and if a deal were to go through, the platform's U.S. business could have its valuation soar to upward of $60 billion.

item.title: Android prépare un mode « Transports en commun » pour faciliter vos trajets
item.description: Android s'apprête à transformer vos trajets quotidiens avec un nouveau mode « Transports ». Repéré dans le code du système, il promet d'automatiser vos réglages (Bluetooth, volume) et d'afficher vos infos en temps réel sur l'écran de verrouillage.

item.title: Nintendo’s Talking Mario Wonder Flower Is Somehow Less Annoying Than Most AI Gadgets
item.description: Nintendo's Wonder Flower toy joins Alarmo to annoy everybody in the bedroom.

item.title: Canon EOS R6 III review: A video powerhouse that's also great for photography
item.description: With video features like RAW now the norm on midrange mirrorless cameras, Canon decided not to mess around with its latest model, the 33-megapixel EOS R6 III. It’s a veritable cinematic beast, allowing up to 7K RAW video capture internally with fast and reliable autofocus and rock solid stabilization. At the same time, it's a solid photo camera with high burst speeds and warm, accurate image quality. The R6 III has stiff competition with Sony’s 33MP A7 V, though, as the latter delivers higher dynamic range. The price could also be an issue for buyers, as the R6 III costs $300 more than its pr...

item.title: Oscars 2026: Who got snubbed?
item.description: The 98th Academy Awards has some explaining to do when it comes to "Wicked: For Good."

item.title: AMD’s faster Ryzen 7 9850X3D CPU arrives on January 29th for $499
item.description: AMD announced an improved version of its popular Ryzen 7 9800X3D processor at CES earlier this month, and it's now confirming a release date and pricing today. The new Ryzen 7 9850X3D will debut on January 29th, priced at $499. That's $20 more than the initial retail pricing of the 9800X3D, and this faster 9850X3D […]

item.title: À ce prix-là, le pack Google Pixel 10 + Buds A est le super deal des soldes d’hiver
item.description: En plein cœur des soldes d’hiver, Fnac et Darty bradent le récent Google Pixel 10 à un prix particulièrement avantageux, avec en prime une paire d’écouteurs Buds 2a incluse pour rendre l’offre encore plus attractive.

item.title: Under Armour says it’s ‘aware’ of data breach claims after 72M customer records were posted online
item.description: TechCrunch obtained a sample of the stolen data, which contained names, email addresses, dates of birth, and the user's approximate geographic location. Under Armour confirmed some sensitive information was taken in the breach.

item.title: Forget boring office chairs — these IKEA picks will bring serious style to your workspace
item.description: A home office upgrade on the dull design of your usual office furniture.

item.title: Décision judiciaire | Ottawa suspend l’interdiction de TikTok au Canada
item.description: Le gouvernement fédéral a accepté de suspendre sa décision ordonnant la fermeture des activités canadiennes de TikTok.

item.title: How CIOs can shift from patch and pray to risk-based software change
item.description: Forced updates and “patch and pray” thinking are creating avoidable risk in life-critical systems. Vendor business models, built on upgrade pressure and baked-in greed, are driving that risk.

item.title: Lenovo ThinkPad P1 Gen 8 Review: A Laptop That Will Torpedo Your Work/Life Balance
item.description: It's got an incredibly bright OLED screen with performance that will keep you from using it for much else than work.

item.title: Hollywood actors and artists just made a move against AI slop
item.description: Generative AI’s sticky fingers on copyrighted material continues to prompt creatives to fight for more protections. A new campaign launches today against AI’s sticky fingers on copyrighted material.

item.title: Google reportedly snags up team behind AI voice startup Hume AI
item.description: Google has hired the CEO and top top behind voice AI startup Hume AI, signaling that voice is increasingly becoming the preferred interface over screens.

item.title: E.Leclerc frappe fort à la 3e démarque : voici les 11 meilleurs deals Tech des soldes
item.description: La 3ᵉ démarque des soldes lance une nouvelle salve de bonnes affaires chez les e-commerçants, dont E.Leclerc qui met les bouchées doubles sur les produits Tech — smartphones, TV OLED, montres connectées, tablettes… avec une sélection de promos qui valent vraiment le détour.

item.title: The Switch 2 version of Super Mario Bros. Wonder arrives on March 26
item.description: While many of us wait (im)patiently for a brand new Mario platformer for the Switch 2, Nintendo is filling the gap with an upgraded version of the tremendous Super Mario Bros. Wonder for the console. Super Mario Bros. Wonder – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Meetup in Bellabel Park (to give the new edition's full name) will arrive on March 26. Those who own the original Switch version of the game will be able to buy an upgrade pack, which costs $20. There's a lot of new stuff in the Switch 2 version, including co-op and multiplayer features. Bellabel Park, a fresh area of the Flower Kingdom, will ...

item.title: It’s not a bubble, we’re surfing the AI wave
item.description: Is AI hype a fleeting bubble or a sustained wave reshaping business and technology?

item.title: Inflation fears in the U.S. are running high, especially for this demographic, a survey shows
item.description: According to a survey from AAPI Data and The Associated Press-NORC Center for Public Affairs Research, nearly half of Asian American and Pacific Islander adults said they wanted the government to prioritize the high cost of living. Anxiety about costs and affordability is particularly high among Asian Americans, Pacific Islanders and Native Hawaiians, even at a moment when economic stress is widespread, according to a new poll.About half of Asian American and Pacific Islander adults said they wanted the government to prioritize addressing the high cost of living and inflation, according to the...

item.title: From invisibility cloaks to AI chips: Neurophos raises $110M to build tiny optical processors for inferencing
item.description: Neurophos is taking a crack at solving the AI industry's power efficiency problem with an optical chip that uses a composite material to do the math required in AI inferencing tasks.

item.title: Spaceship web hosting review
item.description: Spaceship hosting offers low prices and decent performance, though it has a few quirks.

item.description: The new Secretlab Pokémon collection feature three special edition gaming chairs.

item.title: "In conclusion, the reviewed scope appears to be on a good security level compared to systems of similar size and complexity." — Independent review confirms Mullvad’s strong privacy protections
item.description: Mullvad’s latest security audit confirms that Mullvad’s account and payment services continue to meet high standards, finding no critical flaws.

item.title: Apple pourrait-elle faire payer le nouveau Siri ?
item.description: Siri va subir de gros changements cette année. Au printemps, l'assistant devrait gagner de nouvelles capacités pour répondre de manière plus pertinente et personnalisée aux questions de l'utilisateur ; et à la rentrée, il pourrait devenir un « vrai » chatbot, à la manière de ChatGPT. Mais tout cela sera-t-il gratuit ?

item.title: Anthropic has to keep revising its technical interview test so you can’t cheat on it with Claude
item.description: Since 2024, Anthropic's performance optimization team has given job seekers a take-home test to make sure they know their stuff — but as AI coding tools have gotten better, the test has had to change a lot to stay ahead of AI-assisted cheating.

item.title: Zendesk tickets hijacked in massive spam campaign
item.description: Someone is sending hundreds of pointless emails to people, using Zendesk's ticketing system.

item.title: Blue Origin schedules third New Glenn launch for late February, but not to the moon
item.description: Jeff Bezos' Blue Origin had previously suggested that the third launch of the mega-rocket would take the space company's robotic lunar lander to the moon.

item.title: This plugin uses Wikipedia’s AI-spotting guide to make AI writing sound more human
item.description: A new tool aims to help AI chatbots generate more human-sounding text - with the help of Wikipedia's guide for detecting AI, as reported by Ars Technica. Developer Siqi Chen says he created the tool, called Humanizer, by feeding Anthropic's Claude the list of tells that Wikipedia's volunteer editors put together as part of an […]

item.title: 3I/Atlas s’aligne avec la Terre et le Soleil cette nuit : après les images troublantes de Hubble, l’heure de vérité approche
item.description: Ces derniers jours, de nouvelles données concernant la comète interstellaire 3I/Atlas ont une fois de plus semé le trouble sur sa nature. Cette nuit, l’objet venu d'ailleurs va s’aligner avec la Terre, à l’opposé du Soleil. Une occasion unique pour comprendre enfin de quoi il est fait.

item.title: 4 To de stockage : ce disque dur est soldé à -41%, une aubaine rare en pleine pénurie de stockage
item.description: Ce disque dur externe de 4 To actuellement en promotion sur Amazon s’impose comme une vraie bonne affaire des soldes d’hiver, surtout dans un contexte où les solutions de stockage ont tendance à voir leurs prix grimper.

item.title: Sinners just smashed an Oscars record
item.description: Ryan Coogler's "Sinners" has just hit an Oscars record out of the park, landing a whopping 16 Academy Award nominations.
